snippet: NEWMAN--Howard A. (Micky) Feb. 2, 1921- April 12, 2006 Every day we remember your warmth and humanity, your spirit and generosity. Our love for you never fades. We hold you in our hearts. From all your family and many friends 1/3
lead_paragraph: NEWMAN--Howard A. (Micky) Feb. 2, 1921- April 12, 2006 Every day we remember your warmth and humanity, your spirit and generosity. Our love for you never fades. We hold you in our hearts. From all your family and many friends 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  NEWMAN, HOWARD A
